‘Nothing but rumour and doubt’: Scientists hit out at Government secrecy over sector reforms https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nothing-but-rumour-and-doubt-scientists-hit-out-at-govt-secrecy-over-sector-reforms/BBBE7SRB6ZGAVCWUTMFM2X6GA4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nothing-but-rumour-and-doubt-scientists-hit-out-at-govt-secrecy-over-sector-reforms/BBBE7SRB6ZGAVCWUTMFM2X6GA4/ Jamie MortonA scientists’ coalition has hit out at Govt silence regarding a long-planned sector reset. Sentencing postponed for Kuresa Anderson who jumped behind wheel of Auckland bus while drunk https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/sentencing-postponed-for-kuresa-anderson-who-jumped-behind-wheel-of-auckland-bus-while-drunk/I53OOVG3TFBWJLAGTYQ2RWMJNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/sentencing-postponed-for-kuresa-anderson-who-jumped-behind-wheel-of-auckland-bus-while-drunk/I53OOVG3TFBWJLAGTYQ2RWMJNQ/ Craig KapitanHe said he drank 'two goons and was trying to be stupid' but didn't want to steal the bus. Sun, 15 Dec 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Kuresa Anderson has pleaded guilty to drunkenly jumping in the driver's seat of a $400,000 Auckland Transport bus as his mates chased the driver away, releasing the handbrake and causing the bus to lurch several metres back and forth.
